name: CAMBIA HEALTH SOLUTIONS (FORMERLY KNOWN AS THE REGENCE GROUP)
description: Not-for-profit health insurer covering four states in the Northwest, US
sampleDescriptions:
Departments of Health and Human Services and Labor's rules regarding Associated Health Plans. 

Administrative regulations, rules and guidances related to insurance market stability for both state and federal individual insurance marketplaces.

H.R.1625/PL-No.115 - Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 - Policy related to individual market stabilization.

H.R. 1301 - Continuing Resolution of 2018/PL 115-124-  advocacy for the inclusion of the CHRONIC Act as well as repeal and/or delay of the Health Insurance Tax.

S. 1028/ H.R. 3759- RAISE Family Care Givers Act - issues related to developing better systems to integrate families into palliative and end-of-life care and related programs dedicated to the work.

S. 1334/H.R. 2797- Patient Choice and Quality Care Act of 2017 - Issues related to better integrating and improving palliative and end of life care into our nation's health care system.

Rules and Regulations regarding 1332 waivers and other issues impact the private insurance market. 

Issues related to containing and decreasing prescription drug costs to consumers. 

Issues related to making health care in the United States of America more transparent and consumer-focused.
